title: Timing Function Block
description: This function block is designed to measure elapsed time while a specified input signal is true, with options for resetting and managing maximum time constraints.
name: M_T

input.name: IN
input.description: A boolean input that, when true, starts the timing measurement.

input.name: TMAX
input.description: The maximum allowable elapsed time that can be measured. Defaults to 14400 minutes.

input.name: RST
input.description: A boolean input to reset the elapsed time measurements.

output.name: PT
output.description: The previous time value recorded before the reset or input changes.

output.name: ET
output.description: The elapsed time measured from the rising edge of the input signal.
